text: South Korean R&B; trio Urban Zakapa have released five studio albums, four extended plays, and seven singles. Originally a nine-member group, Urban Zakapa debuted with the song "Café Latte (커피를 마시고)" in 2009. ==Studio albums== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:10em;" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="1" style="width:5em;" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- !
